name: Water UK
goal:
Water UK is the membership body for the UK water and sewerage companies. Water UK exists to help make better policies for the future of water.

We work alongside policy makers in national and regional Governments in the UK and the European institutions.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
There are a number of pieces of legislation, policies and files that have a very major impact on the water sector.

The major ones are:
- Water Framework Directive
- Urban Wastewater Treatment Directive
- Drinking Water Directive
- Nitrates Directive
- REACH

Looking more widely, policies on energy, infrastructure, agriculture (eg CAP), all also have potential for very major impact on the water sector.

Also, policies around finance, pricing, investment and economics also have a potential impact.
